price: Hai ahli kitab, mengapa kamu mengingkari ayat-ayat Allah202, padahal kamu mengetahui (kebenarannya).
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ
footnotes: 202.  Yakni, ayat-ayat Allah Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā diturunkan kepada Nabi Muhammad Ṣallallāhu ʻAlaihi wa Sallam.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
